title: the alert message is not correct when you upload a folder using drag&drop
body:
### expected behaviour
when you upload a folder using drag&drop i am not sure if the folder should upload but if not the correct alert message should be shown

### actual behaviour

### steps to reproduce
1. log in the enterprise version
2. upload a folder using drag&drop
3. check that the alert message that is shown is not the correct

### server configuration
{"installed":"true","version":"5.0.15","versionstring":"5.0.9","edition":"enterprise"}
sql lite

### client configuration
browser: chrome
![screen shot 2013-07-29 at 13 13 32](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/4689430/871186/7fa1d6ca-f842-11e2-8e6b-a7d6dfa09578.png)

browser: ff and safari

![screen shot 2013-07-29 at 13 15 01](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/4689430/871189/8d25a1d2-f842-11e2-9733-fcf2fb4da2ea.png)

operating system:mac 10.8.3
